message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 6000, you take 4000.
I think a 5500/4500 split is fairer, considering the money will lose value with each round.  Let's be reasonable and end this quickly.
Bob, this is getting us nowhere.  I'll concede a bit - 5600 for me, 4400 for you. This is a good deal considering the inflation working against you.
